simple.title: Present Simple
simple.explanation: Used for habits, general truths, and permanent situations.
examples: The sun rises in the east
simple.translation: Настоящее простое время - для привычек, общих истин и постоянных ситуаций.

simple.title: Past Simple
simple.explanation: Used for completed actions in the past.
simple.translation: Прошедшее простое время - для завершенных действий в прошлом.

simple.title: Future Simple
simple.explanation: Used for predictions and spontaneous decisions.
simple.translation: Будущее простое время - для предсказаний и спонтанных решений.

continuous.title: Present Continuous
continuous.explanation: Used for actions happening now or around now.
continuous.translation: Настоящее длительное время - для действий, происходящих сейчас.

continuous.title: Past Continuous
continuous.explanation: Used for actions in progress at a specific time in the past.
examples: She was studying when I called
continuous.translation: Прошедшее длительное время - для действий в процессе в прошлом.

continuous.title: Future Continuous
continuous.explanation: Used for actions in progress at a specific time in the future.
examples: I will be working at 5 PM
continuous.translation: Будущее длительное время - для действий в процессе в будущем.

perfect.title: Present Perfect
perfect.explanation: Used for actions that happened at an unspecified time before now.
examples: I have worked here for 5 years
perfect.translation: Настоящее совершенное время - для действий, произошедших в неопределенное время до настоящего момента.

perfect.title: Past Perfect
perfect.explanation: Used for actions completed before another action in the past.
examples: I had worked before I went home
She had visited London before she moved there
They had finished their homework before dinner
perfect.translation: Прошедшее совершенное время - для действий, завершенных до другого действия в прошлом.

perfect.title: Future Perfect
perfect.explanation: Used for actions that will be completed before a specific time in the future.
examples: I will have worked here for 5 years by next month
She will have visited London by the end of the year
They will have finished their homework by 8 PM
perfect.translation: Будущее совершенное время - для действий, которые будут завершены к определенному времени в будущем.

perfect_continuous.title: Present Perfect Continuous
perfect_continuous.explanation: Used for actions that started in the past and continue to the present.
examples: I have been working here for 5 years
perfect_continuous.translation: Настоящее совершенное длительное время - для действий, начавшихся в прошлом и продолжающихся до настоящего момента.

perfect_continuous.title: Past Perfect Continuous
perfect_continuous.explanation: Used for actions that were in progress before another action in the past.
examples: I had been working for 5 hours when you called
She had been studying English before she moved
They had been playing football before it started raining
perfect_continuous.translation: Прошедшее совершенное длительное время - для действий, которые были в процессе до другого действия в прошлом.

perfect_continuous.title: Future Perfect Continuous
perfect_continuous.explanation: Used for actions that will be in progress before a specific time in the future.
examples: I will have been working here for 5 years by next month
She will have been studying English for 2 years by December
They will have been playing football for 3 hours by 6 PM
perfect_continuous.translation: Будущее совершенное длительное время - для действий, которые будут в процессе к определенному времени в будущем.
